metadata.title: Everyday I'm Huffling Huffle Badger Cute Funny Animal T-Shirt
features: Solid colors: 100% Cotton; Heather Grey: 90% Cotton, 10% Polyester; All Other Heathers: 50% Cotton, 50% Polyester

This design is just one of many that we pride ourselves in having as a part of the best Christmas, graduation, anniversary, birthday, and general holiday gifts to choose from for your family and friends!

This funny design is a great ice breaker and conversation starter when meeting someone for the first time at a party, movie, or any occasion, & you will love the soft feel & will want to wear it day and night!
Lightweight, Classic fit, Double-needle sleeve and bottom hem
description: This design was created by one of the best artwork creators in the world for the Always Awesome Apparel brand with you, the buyer, in mind. This one was made with care and attention to comedy. And if you are looking for graphics, variety, funny sayings, or apparel with sayings that will make you think, and you love this design, then you have found the brand for you!
metadata.details: {"Package Dimensions": "10 x 8 x 1 inches; 4.8 Ounces", "Department": "Womens", "Date First Available": "July 27, 2016", "Manufacturer": "Always Awesome Funny"}
